ygData.subject: RE: Hunting griffennes in NK...
ygData.msgSnippet: i did not post it, but definitely used the info.  got me a griffenne charm in about 20 minutes.  the loc is 100,1000 or 1000,100 can not remember which, but
ygData.messageBody:
i did not post it, but definitely used the info. got me a griffenne charm
in about 20 minutes. the loc is 100,1000 or 1000,100 can not remember
which, but both are relatively close to eahc other and you should be able to
see the named treant or the pillar if nearby.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server

>
> From: galen@...
>
> Here is a tip which was posted on this list a while ago (wish
> I could remember who posted it,) and I thought it was worth
> mentioning again. (I know it REALLY helped me when I was
> trying to get my bracers.)
>
> Along the Northern wall of NK, there is a hill with a column.
> This is near the named treant, and in the area where the
> werewolf hunters roam. Anyway, a griffenne or a griffawn will
> spawn there once every 8 minutes, and I camped the area no
> more than an hour and a half for each bracelet. Anyway, if
> you are on Xegony and need the /loc give me a yell in game (I
> have it written down at home.)
>
> Safe hunting...
>
> Gaelthorne
